Search Search Search Department of Mathematics and Computer Science Optimization of Machine Learning Systems Group Search Search Search People Research Teaching Publications News Contact Publications Projects Courses People Research Teaching Publications News Contact Publications Projects Courses Prof. Dr. Aurelien Lucchi ProfessorPhilosophisch-Naturwissenschaftliche FakultätDepartement Mathematik und InformatikFG LucchiProfessor Spiegelgasse 1 4051 Basel Schweiz Tel. +41 61 207 14 62aurelien.lucchi@unibas.chMore information Google Scholar Bio Prof. Dr. Aurelien Lucchi is an assistant professor at the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science at the University of Basel. He holds a Ph.D. in computer science from the École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL). He also held a scientic research position at ETH Zurich from 2014 to 2021. He has a broad academic track record in various areas of machine learning and optimization.
